abstract.p: Peninsula Hotel in New York offers bottles of free water to guests (S)

block.p: The Peninsula, 55th Street and Fifth Avenue in New York, now offers 16.9-ounce bottles of five waters free to guests. The menu (subject to change) includes Poland Spring (Maine), Saratoga (New York), Grayson Mountain, Quibell (both Virginia) and Vermont Pure. Call (800) 262-9467.

Tony Tan, a Malaysian-born chef, is leading a culinary tour through Vietnam Oct. 16 to 27. The tour, run by Absolute Asia, will include visits to markets, cooking demonstrations and meals in restaurants and private homes. The price, $4,950 a person based on double occupancy, includes rooms, most meals, sightseeing, transfers, flights in Vietnam and visa. Information: (212) 627-1950.
